data.lyric:
[ti:Take My Breath]
[ar:The Weeknd]
[al:Take My Breath]
[by:]

[00:00.41]Take My Breath - The Weeknd
[00:01.92]Lyrics by：Max Martin/Oscar Holter/Abel Tesfaye/Ahmad Balshe
[00:04.38]Composed by：Max Martin/Oscar Holter/Abel Tesfaye/Ahmad Balshe
[00:06.51]
[00:30.20]I saw the fire in your eyes
[00:32.60]
[00:34.11]I saw the fire when I looked into your eyes
[00:37.04]
[00:38.02]You tell me things you wanna try
[00:40.32]
[00:41.97]I know temptation is the devil in disguise
[00:44.87]
[00:45.96]You risk it all to feel alive oh yeah
[00:49.16]
[00:49.95]You're offering yourself to me like you sacrifice
[00:52.83]
[00:53.81]You said you did this all the time
[00:56.68]
[00:57.95]Tell me you love me if I bring you to the light
[01:00.86]
[01:02.78]It's like a dream
[01:04.85]What she feels with me
[01:06.88]She loves to be on the edge
[01:10.82]Her fantasy is okay with me
[01:14.79]Then suddenly baby says
[01:18.68]Take my breath away
[01:22.40]And make it last forever babe
[01:24.33]Do it now or never babe
[01:26.57]Take my breath away
[01:30.33]Nobody does it better babe
[01:32.42]Bring me close to-
[01:33.57]Want me to hold onto you tight
[01:35.79]
[01:37.52]You pull me closer feel the heat between your thighs
[01:40.46]
[01:41.38]You're way too young to end your life
[01:44.36]
[01:45.43]Girl I don't wanna be the one who pays the price
[01:48.43]
[01:49.68]Ooh it's like a dream
[01:52.40]What she feels with me
[01:54.42]She loves to be on the edge
[01:58.27]Her fantasy is okay with me
[02:02.37]Then suddenly baby says
[02:07.10]
[02:08.29]Take my breath away
[02:11.89]And make it last forever babe
[02:13.99]Do it now or never babe
[02:16.16]Take my breath away
[02:19.83]Nobody does it better babe
[02:22.07]Bring me close to heaven babe
[02:24.07]Take my breath
[02:25.11]
[02:28.20]Oh oh-oh-ooh they'll see me
[02:37.69]
[02:40.00]Oh-ooh ooh-oh no
[02:43.40]
[02:44.87]Oh-oh oh-oh oh-oh oh-oh
[02:52.19]
[02:52.79]Oh-oh oh-oh oh-oh
[02:59.80]Take my breath away
[03:00.98]Take my breath away
[03:03.60]And make it last forever babe
[03:05.59]Do it now or never babe
[03:07.73]Take my breath away
[03:08.73]Take my breath away

[03:13.68]We'll be close to heaven babe
[03:15.05]Close
[03:15.79]Take my breath away
[03:16.84]Take my breath away breath away

data.trans:
[ti:Take My Breath]
[ar:The Weeknd]
[al:Take My Breath]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.41]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.92]//
[00:04.38]//
[00:06.51]
[00:30.20]我看见你眼中燃起炙热火焰
[00:32.60]
[00:34.11]当你我四目相对 我看见了你眼中的熊熊烈焰
[00:37.04]
[00:38.02]你向我诉说 让你跃跃欲试的各种奇思
[00:40.32]
[00:41.97]我知道诱惑这种恶魔衣冠楚楚
[00:44.87]
[00:45.96]你赌上一切危险 为了感受心脏的跳动
[00:49.16]
[00:49.95]你将自己献给了我 仿佛牺牲了自我
[00:52.83]
[00:53.81]你说你一直如此
[00:56.68]
[00:57.95]如果我带你走向光明 跟我说一句你爱我
[01:00.86]
[01:02.78]她对我的汹涌情感
[01:04.85]恍然若梦
[01:06.88]她喜欢命悬一线的那种刺激
[01:10.82]我对她的奇妙幻想没有意见
[01:14.79]然后突然 这宝贝说
[01:18.68]来夺走我的呼吸
[01:22.40]让此刻成为永恒 宝贝
[01:24.33]勿失良机 宝贝
[01:26.57]来夺走我的呼吸
[01:30.33]没有人比你更擅长 宝贝
[01:32.42]带我去触碰
[01:33.57]想要我紧紧抱住你
[01:35.79]
[01:37.52]你把我拉近 感受你双腿之间的热度
[01:40.46]
[01:41.38]你还太年轻 不能过早地结束生命
[01:44.36]
[01:45.43]女孩 我不想因为一时冲动而付出代价
[01:48.43]
[01:49.68]她对我的汹涌情感
[01:52.40]恍然若梦

[01:58.27]我对她的奇妙幻想没有意见

[02:19.83]没有人比你更擅长 宝贝
[02:22.07]带我去触碰天堂 宝贝
[02:24.07]来夺走我的呼吸

[02:28.20]他们会看见我
